description: The Thread model object represents a single Thread.

forumId.description: The ID of the forum this Thread belongs to

projectId.description: The ID of the project this Thread belongs to

createdOn.description: The timestamp when this Thread was created

createdBy.description: The id of the user that created this Thread

modifiedOn.description: The timestamp when this Thread was last modified

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time an entity is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of an entity is out-of-date.

messageKey.description: The S3 key where the actual message stored

messageUrl.description: The URL to download the file that contains the message

numberOfViews.description: The number of unique users who has viewed this thread

numberOfReplies.description: The number of replies to this thread

lastActivity.description: The timestamp when the last activity occurs on this Thread

activeAuthors.description: The list of userId whose most active on this Thread

isEdited.description: Has the author edited this Thread?
